import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface item { name:string, icon:string } @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { menuItems:item[] = [{name:'home',icon:'pi pi-home'},{name:'home',icon:'pi pi-home'}] }
